thread.title: Sanjay Dutt buys team in Masters Champions League
thread.title_full: Sanjay Dutt buys team in Masters Champions League - Sports

author: A correspondent
title: Sanjay Dutt buys team in Masters Champions League
text:
Bollywood actor Sanjay Dutt, who is currently serving his jail term after being convicted in the 1993 bomb blasts, has bought a franchise in the UAE-based Masters Champions League (MCL) with his wife Manyata have acquired a team in the upcoming Masters Champions League (MCL).

Manyata and Sanjay Dutt 
Sanjay and Manyata are looking forward to take their love for cricket ahead.
The Twenty20 tournament is for retired cricket players comprises six teams that will get underway next year. The likes of Brian Lara and Virender Sehwag are part of the league.
